title: Linxup Sales Analysis
description: Analyzed data from Snowflake across three large datasets using Python and SQL; conducted time series analysis to evaluate monthly revenue fluctuations and customer tenure impact on upsell timing. Built a LightGBM model to predict upsell/churn likelihood by industry; visualized findings in Tableau and delivered actionable recommendations for customer segmentation for targeted marketing strategies and ROI.

title: Gap Analysis in Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure
description: Led a 4-member team to analyze 100,000+ data points; used Python libraries (pandas, numpy, matplotlib, seaborn, scikit-learn) for data cleaning and manipulation, Scipy for hypothesis testing, Statsmodels for linear regression models and forecasting infrastructure demand, and Tableau and Power BI to visualize trends. Delivered data-driven recommendations on state-specific charging station needs to align with EV adoption trends.

title: Experience Design Anaysis
description: This project demonstrates how the selection of colors, fonts, shapes, languages, layout and other styles can lead to drastically different user experiences, by comparing landing pages of 3 bank websites built from scratch.

title: Bunder
description: An MVP Proposal - Bunder is an intuitive web platform for micro-communities to share sensitive data with privacy within the community and allow engagement amongst them.

title: Suicide Analyzer
description: This is a web application, uses a map to demonstrate the number suicides committed around the globe, according to a dataset provided by the WHO.

title: Nutricare
description: A web app for patients to input nutrient intake data and researchers to analyse the data with the help of graphs and tables. A researcher can conduct studies on N different subjects for a particular problem statement.
